resources.string: What would you like to talk about?

Always consult with a trained mental health professional if you\'re experiencing depressive feelings and/or difficuties in your daily functioning that causeyou anxiety or worry.This test is meant to be used as a starting point, not as a diagnosis tool.This score is not intended as a mental disorder diagnosis or as any type of health recommendation.
A screening is not a diagnosis,but can be a helpful tool for starting a conversation with your doctor or a loved one about your mental health
